name: 莊欣慈
objective: 教導學生閱讀囊括全球議題的文章，並藉由文章的內容作技巧的訓練，字彙的建構，語言的解析，及思維的啟發。課中延展活動將閱讀內容與聽力、會話、寫作做進一步的連結，並引導學生將所學做有效的應用。
schedule:
Week(s)	Read to Succeed 4
1        	Orientation
2       	Unit 1 – Show off Your Moves
3       	Unit 2 – Treasure beyond your Wildest Dreams
4       	Review Unit 1 & 2
5        	Unit 3 – The Technological Age
6       	Unit 4 – Crazy for Crafts
7       	Review Unit 3 & 4
8       	Presentations
9       	Midterm Examination
10     	Unit 5 – Powerful Superstitions
11     	Unit 6 – Money Makes the World Go ‘Round 
12      	Review Unit 5 & 6
13     	Unit 7 – The Science of Sleep
14     	Unit 8 – An Important Day for Everyone
15     	Review Unit 7 & 8
16 - 17	Presentations
18	        Final Examination
scorePolicy:
上課出席 (如:上課活動、小組討論、筆記寫作、報告表現等)  50%
回家作業 (如:作文寫作、閱讀預習、小組共同作業等)  20%
期中全校英文會考成績  15%
期末全校英文會考成績  15%
